name: Sky Eggs
description:
Move your basket to collect the eggs and try to improve your score every game!

Features:

  • Very easy to understand the game
  • Multiple difficulty modes
  • Difficulty increases based on time and score in the game
  • No internet connection required to play
  • No ads

If you have any feedback, constructive criticism, or encountered a problem, feel free to leave a comment!

I will release updates based on your feedback.

More info about Sky Eggs

Sky Eggs is a little arcade game where the player has to collect eggs to improve his score every game.

The game is available for Windows and Google Play for free.

I made this game in two weeks and took me 2 months to release it because you know, Google Play Console is funny :)
